metadata.title: Wednesday, 12th June, 2024
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development and Social Services
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to restructure the distribution of fertilizer under the Food Security Pack Programme in wetland areas;
(b)     if so, whether the use of cooperatives, as an economically viable channel, will be considered; and
(c)    which constituencies are earmarked for the implementation of the exercise.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a water reticulation system in Itezhi-Tezhi District; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts
parts: (a) whether the Government conducted a survey to ascertain the number of youths that did not acquire grades 9 and 12 school certificates, as of August, 2023;
(b) if so, what the number of youths was, for each grade and segregated by gender, as of the date above;
(c) how many youths were employed in the formal and informal sectors, as of the date at (a); and
(d) what measures the Government is taking to create more job opportunities for the youths.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to set up wetland farming blocks in Chilubi District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is.
(a) at what intervals rural health centres receive grants from the Government;
(b) what the grants are meant to cater for; and
(c) whether there are any plans to increase the amount in each grant.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a sports stadium at Changanamai Grounds in Kwacha Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the time frame for the completion of the project is;
(d) what the estimated cost of the project is; and

(e) if there are no such plans, why. 6.
